Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: Great pizza, nice and clean restaurant. Family friendly. Also easy street parking if you need to drive there.

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: My boyfriend and I went here for dinner tonight after searching the neighborhood for restaurants close to our Airbnb, we're very glad we did! The service was excellent and we found that the menu had a very good selection of different types ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: The atmosphere, the lightning, the music, the pizza, the dessert and above all the staff were all perfect. Mama Dough has instantly made it to my favorites list and I will definitely come back so please do not change a thing!!

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: Good pizza of a satisfying size for a slightly high price. Drinks are really good, including beer and lemonades. Staff was friendly. Recommended

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: Fabulous, well-chosen, selection of pizza toppings. I‚Äôd give 5 stars except that the pizza dough is really salty, so there‚Äôs little contrast between the base and the toppings, which given the excellent quality of the ingredients, is a disappointment. However, if you enjoy salty food, you won‚Äôt mind at all.

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: Very nice food especially the vegan pizzas are worth their price.

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: Excellent pizza, the sauce was particularly amazing (we had the Burrata). Service was super friendly and attentive on a really busy Friday night. Atmosphere was lovely. Would definitely recommend!

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text:

Review Text: Great pizza. A bit pricy but that‚Äôs Amsterdam prices.

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text:
Food was really excellent, nice atmosphere, friendly local authentic place.
Pizza is fresh and tasty. Prices are inconsistent with desserts costing nearly as much as mains! The owner and his staff do a great job.

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text:
Very tasty pizzas. I go there often.
If you‚Äôre are looking for a typical Italian pizza recipes it might not be the right place. I would say the pizzas are more a revisited version of classics. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: I believe 1 star is way too much for what we received. One SAD LOOKING Tuna pizza for ‚Ç¨12.95..... if anyone dares to call that a tuna pizza. You can actually count how many canned tuna flakes are present on top. Used to be a nice food.... someone is degrading this place. Good luck with it.

Review Text:

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: Pretty good pizzas. However, would have preferred if the pizzas were some how pre cut because we ordered quite a few boxes and took us some time to cut the pizzas. :D Otherwise it was yummy.

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: We are three frenchies pizza experts and we approve, in all aspects, Mama Dough!! It was a wonderful taste. Best pizzas!! Thanks again!

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: This place used to make excellent pizzas...but of late...my gosh.. the ingredients are not fresh or tasty...neither are the topping adequate..Really confused as to what changes or went wrong.

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: Nice pizzas for a good price. Great summer time outside pizza place.

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: Tasty italian-style pizza! I enjoyed the salsiccia & friarielli taste, but I'm pretty sure the other ones were also quite good. But the plus of this place is the interior, extremely nice and cozy. Also the location is quite nice, very close ‚Ä¶

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: Favourite pizza place in my neighbourhood. Delicious pizzas. You can simply walk in to their take-away, the order will be done really fast, and you can observe the guys crank out the pizzas.

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: do not understand the excellent ratings, maybe the chef had an off-day? tuna pizza was too moist, cannelloni had too much cheese etcetc. the tiramisu was good though!

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: Pretty good pizza. They have many specific Italian ingredients that you don't find in a regular pizzeria. Nice ambience and solid wine. Pizzas could be a bit larger though.

Name: Mama Dough

Name: Mama Dough
Review Text: Pizzas are big which is nice because you get your money's worth of deliciousness. Pizza crust is great, tartufo pizza recommended. Sgroppino is the best I ever had, and the staff is nice. A little bit quiet on a Tuesday perhaps..
